div.p: Specifies the authoritative source or rules for values used to indicate the current version status of the EAS instance.

maintenanceEventTypeEncoding specifies the authoritative source or rules for values supplied in maintenanceStatus within control. If the value "EASList" is selected, maintenanceStatus will be expected with the values "cancelled", "deleted", "deletedMerged", "deletedReplaced", "deletedSplit", "derived", "new", or "revised". If the value "otherMaintenanceStatusEncoding" is selected, an alternate code list should be specified in conventionDeclaration. This optional attribute is available only in control.
